mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, fb_id, fb_word, regitst_date from (select * from board order by regist_date desc)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
mapper.insert: insert into forbidden values ( (select max(fb_id) + 1 from forbidden) , #{ fbWord }, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(fb_word) from forbidden where fb_word = #{ fbWord }
mapper.delete: delete from forbidden where fb_id = #{ fbId }
